error.enderchests.bag.nolink1: Can not link bag, you do not own this chest
error.enderchests.bag.nolink2: Can not link bag, Chest owner is unknown
error.enderchests.bag.nolink3: Can not link bag, you're not on the same team
error.enderchests.bag.corrupted: Can not open bag; Stack NBT data missing
error.enderchests.chest.public.disabled: Public chests are disabled, chests must be upgraded to use
error.enderchests.chest.private.disabled: Creation of private chests is disabled
error.enderchests.chest.team.disabled: Creation of team chests is disabled
error.enderchests.chest.private.denied: Only the owner can preform that action
error.enderchests.chest.team.denied: Only team members can preform that action
error.enderchests.chest.upgrade_used: That upgrade item can only be applied once per chest
error.enderchests.bag.private.disabled: Creation of private bags is disabled
error.enderchests.bag.team.disabled: Creation of team bags is disabled
enderchests.configuration.in_world_color: With this disabled chests are essentially locked to the crafted color as dyes will no longer work
enderchests.configuration.full_stack_lin:
When linking stacked bags:
 True = all of them will be linked
 False = one at a time will be linked
Items used to upgrade the EnderChests
 Formatted: <modId>:<item> or tag|<tagId>
enderchests.configuration.convert_to_per: Items used to make the chests personal
enderchests.configuration.convert_to_tea: Items used to make the chests team chests
enderchests.configuration.small_capacity: Items that upgrade storage capacity by 3
enderchests.configuration.large_capacity: Items that upgrade storage capacity by 9
enderchests.configuration.small_capacity:
Items that upgrade storage capacity by 3
 Each item can only be use once per chest
enderchests.configuration.large_capacity:
Items that upgrade storage capacity by 9
 Each item can only be use once per chest
enderchests.configuration.ender_pouch.to: When enabled these bags access a players vanilla EnderChest, if disabled they will only be a crafting ingredient
Enables the usage of public chests, if disabled chests must be upgraded before use
enderchests.configuration.personal_chest:
Enables the creation of personal chests, if disabled chests can not set personal
 Changing this does not effect chests that are already set as personal
enderchests.configuration.team_chests.to:
Enables the creation of team chests, if disabled chests can not be set team
 Changing this does not effect chests that are already set as team
enderchests.configuration.public_bags.to: Enables the usage of public bags, if disabled bags must be linked to an upgraded chest before use
Enables the linking of bags to personal chests
 Changing this does not effect bags that are already linked to personal chests
enderchests.configuration.team_bags.tool:
Enables the linking of bags to team chests
 Changing this does not effect bags that are already linked to team chests
enderchests.configuration.public_automat: Public chests can be used with automation (Hoppers, Pipes, etc.)
enderchests.configuration.personal_autom: Personal chests can be used with automation (Hoppers, Pipes, etc.)
enderchests.configuration.team_automatio: Team chests can be used with automation (Hoppers, Pipes, etc.)
enderchests.configuration.personal_edit_: While true a Personal chest can only be edited (upgrade, move, etc) by the owner
enderchests.configuration.team_edit_lock: While true a Team chest can only be edited (upgrade, move, etc) by a team member
enderchests.configuration.personal_link_: While true only the owner can link a bag to their chests
enderchests.configuration.team_link_lock: While true only a team member can link a bag to their chests
enderchests.configuration.personal_use_l: While true only the owner can use the chest
While true only a team member can use the chest
enderchests.configuration.color_values.t:
Input as Decimal, Hex, Octal, or Binary(but why?) 

Input Prefixes;
 Decimal: 0d , none
 Hex: 0x , #
 Octal: 0o , 0
 Binary: 0b
enderchests.configuration.integration.to: Control which mod integrations are enabled
enderchests.configuration.curios_trinket: EnderBag and EnderPouch will function while equipped as a Curio(NeoForge)/Trinket(Fabric)
